headline: Is Cognizant (CTSH) Quietly Recasting Its Identity Around Enterprise-Scale Agentic AI Platforms?
summary: Cognizant announced in February 2026 that it had been selected by one of the world’s largest commercial vehicle manufacturers for a multi-year programme to transform and modernise global workplace services across factories and offices using its AI-powered WorkNEXT platform. This deal, alongside new AI-focused alliances such as the expanded Google Cloud partnership, highlights Cognizant’s push to act as an enterprise-wide builder and operator of agentic AI systems rather than a traditional IT...

headline: Cognizant selected for global AI-driven workplace services transformation
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) has been chosen by one of the world's largest commercial vehicle manufacturers to transform and modernise its global workplace services. This multi-year partnership aims to leverage artificial intelligence and automation to enhance workplace operations across global factories and offices.
